variables.joinQuery:
WITH Joined AS ( 
   SELECT
    -- Vowpal Wabbit JSON ignores _ prefixed variables 
    interaction.EventId _EventId, 
    interaction.PartitionId,
    interaction.EventEnqueuedUtcTime _Timestamp, 
    interaction.a _a, 
    interaction.p _p, 
    interaction.ProbabilityOfDrop _ProbabilityOfDrop, 
    -- Action
    GetArrayElement(interaction.a, 0) _label_Action,
    -- Cost
    CASE  
     WHEN observation IS NULL THEN 0 -- default cost
     ELSE -observation.v -- insert custom reward function using ASA SQL, JavaScript or AzureML
    END _label_Cost,
    -- Probability   
    CASE 
        WHEN interaction.ProbabilityOfDrop IS NULL THEN GetArrayElement(interaction.p, 0) 
        ELSE GetArrayElement(interaction.p, 0) * (1 - interaction.ProbabilityOfDrop)
    END _label_Probability,
    GetArrayElement(interaction.a, 0) - 1 _labelIndex,
    interaction.c c
   FROM interaction TIMESTAMP BY EventEnqueuedUtcTime PARTITION BY PartitionId
   -- always output interaction events, regardless if there is an observation or not
   LEFT OUTER JOIN
   -- shift observation time line before interaction (thus interaction comes later)
   -- the output event timestamp is defined as the maximum of (interaction event, observation event) --> always interaction event timestamp
    observation TIMESTAMP BY DATEADD(Microsecond, -$ExperimentalDurationInMicrosecond$, EventEnqueuedUtcTime) PARTITION BY PartitionId
   -- MUST use Microsecond due to rounding issue in DATEDIFF, otherwise observation events are moved forward by 1 time unit
   -- Allow for early observation events up to 10 minutes
        ON DATEDIFF(Microsecond, observation, interaction) BETWEEN 0 AND $ExperimentalDurationPlusTimeoutInMicrosecond$ 
        AND interaction.EventId = observation.EventId
        AND interaction.PartitionId = observation.PartitionId
),
JoinedUnique AS (
    SELECT _EventId, _Timestamp, TopOne() OVER (ORDER BY _Timestamp) as First
    FROM Joined PARTITION BY PartitionId
    GROUP BY _EventId, _Timestamp, PartitionId, SlidingWindow(Microsecond, 1)
)
 
SELECT _EventId, _Timestamp, First._a, First._p, First._ProbabilityOfDrop, First._label_Action, First._label_Cost, First._label_Probability, First._labelIndex, First.c.* INTO outHubStream FROM JoinedUnique PARTITION BY PartitionId 
SELECT _EventId, _Timestamp, First._a, First._p, First._ProbabilityOfDrop, First._label_Action, First._label_Cost, First._label_Probability, First._labelIndex, First.c.* INTO outBlob FROM JoinedUnique PARTITION BY PartitionId
